channel.title: WME on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in WME on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Max Eisenbud Upped to Head of Client Representation at WME Sports
item.description: The longtime tennis agent at IMG repping Grand Slam champions Carlos Alcaraz, Coco Gauff and Iga Swiatek will oversee talent across a range of sports at the agency.

item.title: Max Eisenbud Upped to Head of Client Representation at WME Sports
item.description: The longtime tennis agent at IMG repping Grand Slam champions Carlos Alcaraz, Coco Gauff and Iga Swiatek will oversee talent across a range of sports at the agency.

item.title: British Olympic Diver Tom Daley Aims for U.S. Ventures With WME, MVE
item.description: Tom Daley, the five-time Olympic champion and YouTube influencer, has signed WME and management company MVE to represent him as he seeks new opportunities in the U.S. across streaming and unscripted v
